name: ADEN
description:
You arrive in this solar system with a battered ice shield and near depleted energy reserves . The Makers did not grant you memories, only a single purpose. As the mothership exits hibernation and begins the startup procedures, you retrieve the mission parameters: Preserve life at all cost.

Gather resources, build spaceship modules, look for alien life and maneuver the dangers of outer space in this semi-realistic 2D physics sandbox.

This game was made for the the 2020 GitHub Game Off game jam.

I recommend downloading the Windows executable for optimalperformance!
